name: awful.titlebar
description:
**Create a titlebar:**

 This example reproduces what the default `rc.lua` does. It shows how to
 handle the titlebars on a lower level.

 

![Usage example](../images/AUTOGEN_awful_titlebar_default.svg)

 
     -- Create a titlebar for the client.
     -- By default, `ruled.client` will create one, but all it does is to call this
     -- function.
     local top_titlebar = awful.titlebar(c, {
         size      = 20,
         bg_normal = &#34#ff0000&#34,
     })
     -- buttons for the titlebar
     local buttons = gears.table.join(
         awful.button({ }, 1, function()
             client.focus = c
             c:raise()
             awful.mouse.client.move(c)
         end),
         awful.button({ }, 3, function()
             client.focus = c
             c:raise()
             awful.mouse.client.resize(c)
         end)
     )
     top_titlebar : setup {
         { -- Left
             awful.titlebar.widget.iconwidget(c),
             buttons = buttons,
             layout  = wibox.layout.fixed.horizontal
         },
         { -- Middle
             { -- Title
                 align  = &#34center&#34,
                 widget = awful.titlebar.widget.titlewidget(c)
             },
             buttons = buttons,
             layout  = wibox.layout.flex.horizontal
         },
         { -- Right
             awful.titlebar.widget.floatingbutton (c),
             awful.titlebar.widget.maximizedbutton(c),
             awful.titlebar.widget.stickybutton   (c),
             awful.titlebar.widget.ontopbutton    (c),
             awful.titlebar.widget.closebutton    (c),
             layout = wibox.layout.fixed.horizontal()
         },
         layout = wibox.layout.align.horizontal
     }

items.summary: Show tooltips when hover on titlebar buttons.
items.name: enable_tooltip

items.summary: Title to display if client name is not set.
items.name: fallback_name

items.summary: The focused titlebar background image image.
items.name: beautiful.titlebar_bgimage_focus

items.summary: The urgent titlebar background image image.
items.name: beautiful.titlebar_bgimage_urgent

map.args: An array containing the widgets disposition

items.summary: Set a declarative widget hierarchy description.
items.name: setup

map.args.size:
The size of the titlebar. Will
   be interpreted as `height` for horizontal titlebars or as `width` for
   vertical titlebars.
map.c: The client the titlebar will be attached to.
map.args: A table with extra arguments for the titlebar.

items.summary: Create a new titlebar for the given client.
items.name: awful.titlebar
items.description:
Every client can hold up to four titlebars, one for each side (i.e. each
 value of `args.position`).

 If this constructor is called again with the same
 values for the client (`c`) and the titlebar position (`args.position`),
 the previous titlebar will be removed and replaced by the new one.

 

![Usage example](../images/AUTOGEN_awful_titlebar_constructor.svg)

 
     -- Create default titlebar
     awful.titlebar(c)
     -- Create titlebar on the client's bottom edge
     awful.titlebar(c, { position = &#34bottom&#34 })
     -- Create titlebar with inverted colors
     awful.titlebar(c, { bg_normal = beautiful.fg_normal, fg_normal = beautiful.bg_normal })

map.c: The client whose titlebar is modified
map.position:
The position of the titlebar. Must be one of `"left"`,
   `"right"`, `"top"`, `"bottom"`.

request:
client titlebars show granted Called when `awful.titlebar.show` is
  called.

map.c: The client whose titlebar is modified
map.position:
The position of the titlebar. Must be one of `"left"`,
   `"right"`, `"top"`, `"bottom"`.

map.c: The client whose titlebar is modified
map.position:
The position of the titlebar. Must be one of `"left"`,
   `"right"`, `"top"`, `"bottom"`.

items.summary: Toggle the client's titlebar, hiding it if it is visible, otherwise showing it.
items.name: toggle

request:
client titlebars toggle granted Called when `awful.titlebar.toggle` is
  called.

map.c: The client for which a titlewidget should be created.

items.name: awful.titlebar.widget.titlewidget
items.description:
A title widget displays the name of a client.
 Please note that this returns a textbox and all of textbox' API is available.
 This way, you can e.g. modify the font that is used.

map.c: The client for which an icon widget should be created.

items.name: awful.titlebar.widget.iconwidget
items.description:
An icon widget displays the icon of a client.
 Please note that this returns an imagebox and all of the imagebox' API is
 available. This way, you can e.g. disallow resizes.

map.selector: A function that selects the image that should be displayed.
map.action: Function that is called when the button is clicked.
map.c: The client for which a button is created.
map.name:
Name of the button, used for accessing the theme and
   in the tooltip.

items.name: awful.titlebar.widget.button
items.description:
A button widget displays an image and reacts to
 mouse clicks. Please note that the caller has to make sure that this widget
 gets redrawn when needed by calling the returned widget's `:update()` method.
 The selector function should return a value describing a state. If the value
 is a boolean, either `"active"` or `"inactive"` are used. The actual image is
 then found in the theme as `titlebar_[name]_button_[normal/focus]_[state]`.
 If that value does not exist, the focused state is ignored for the next try.

map.c: The client for which the button is wanted.

items.summary: Create a new float button for a client.
items.name: awful.titlebar.widget.floatingbutton

map.c: The client for which the button is wanted.

items.summary: Create a new closing button for a client.
items.name: awful.titlebar.widget.closebutton

map.c: The client for which the button is wanted.

items.name: awful.titlebar.widget.ontopbutton

map.c: The client for which the button is wanted.
